text: "Not Now John" is a 1983 song by Pink Floyd. It was taken from their 12th studio album The Final Cut. It went to number 30 in the United Kingdom and number 20 in Ireland. It is sung by David Gilmour with Roger Waters singing the interludes and refrains. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Protest songs Category:Pink Floyd songs
title: Not Now John
